quote_last: up,” said Perks. “You lie low till she’s through, and then we’ll go up along to my place, and see if there’s any of them strawberries ripe what I told you about."
title: The Railway Children
author: Edith Nesbit

quote_first: I shall be back at exactly
quote_last: , for our hour of revery together, real sweet revery darling
title: On the Road
author: Jack Kerouac
